name: Polaritron
description:
Polaritron is a fast-paced, touch-based arcade game that plays like the love child of Super Hexagon & Ikaruga, with a touch of Bit.Trip Runner. Change the polarity of your central core to shield yourself from a storm of relentless bullets in a desperate race against time; immersed in colorful visuals and a procedurally generated soundtrack. Click / Press / Tap to change the polarity of the core: the rest is up to your reflexes!
